amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds in H.R. 1 to be used to carry out the provisions of the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act, Health Care and Education Reconciliation Act, or any amendment made by either such Public Law.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 267 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit the use of funds in H.R. 1 to be used to carry out the provisions of the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act, Health Care and Education Reconciliation Act, or any amendment made by either such Public Law.

vote.text: On agreeing to the King (IA) amendment (A094) Agreed to by recorded vote: 241 - 187 (Roll no. 98).
